overview: Showcasing a variety of top Latin artists, this music video collection includes 1990s hits like "Tu Infame Engaño" by Los Temerarios, "Limosnero de Cariño" by Los Rehenes, "Deja una Rosa en Tu Balcon" by Los Acosta and "Como Duele" by Liberacion. Designed to please newcomers to Latin music as well as established fans, this sizzling set also includes videos by Grupo Bryndis, Viento y Sol, Azteka and more.
title: Los Temerarios: Una Gira Romantica
